column1: #Text=Hillary isn't Mother Teresa and neither was Trump Moses.
#Text=And neither have the qualifications or the personal character to aspire to the Presidency.
#Text=Whatever Trump's misdeeds, Hillary and Bill outdid him in spades.
#Text=Would you want a President who denigrated a 12-year old girl who was repeatedly beaten and raped to get a client off?
#Text=Would you want a President who said she would do anything and say anything to achieve her personal goals?
#Text=Oh, and by the way who said publicly that she had two persona - a public one and a private one.
#Text=Would you want President who deliberately ignored repeated requests from her diplomats in Benghazi for more protection?
#Text=She left her people hung out to dry there.
#Text=Would you want a President who sanctioned the downfall of two Middle East countries who were no threat to the U.S.A.?
#Text=Theses countries are now threats to the U.S.A. as Libya is under the influence of ISIS and Egypt has moved into Russia's sphere of influence.
#Text=Hillary wasn't doing this for women she was doing this for herself and no one else.
#Text=So stop with the pedestal - she has feet of clay.
